name: Rajesh Kumar
title: Lead Mechanic
desp: With over 15 years of hands-on experience, Rajesh leads the mechanical team with expertise in engine diagnostics, brake systems, and powertrain repairs.

name: Priya Mehta
title: Service Advisor
desp: Priya is the bridge between customers and technicians. She ensures smooth communication and helps customers make informed service decisions.

name: Amit Sharma
title: Diagnostic Technician
desp: Amit specializes in using advanced diagnostic equipment to identify issues with precision, reducing downtime and ensuring accurate repairs.

name: Sneha Desai
title: System Technician
desp: Sneha is skilled in modern vehicle electronics and system diagnostics, playing a key role in keeping today's tech-driven cars running flawlessly.

name: Arjun Reddy
title: Systems Specialist
desp: Arjun brings deep technical knowledge in both electrical and mechanical systems, ensuring vehicles meet high performance and safety standards.

name: Nehal Kapoor
title: Lead Mechanic
desp: Nehal is a master technician with a passion for delivering high-quality repairs. He leads by example and ensures our team maintains top industry standards.
